description: The Space Physics Archive Search and Extract (SPASE) effort is a Heliophysics community-based project with the goal of facilitating data search and retrieval across the Space and Solar Physics data environment with a common metadata language
name: SPASE
title: Space Physics Archive Search and Extract (SPASE) Metadata Registry
